overview_of_class:
RTVF 369-0 Sec. 20 Topics in Acting for Screen: Comedy, T 12:00-2:50, Louis 106

LEARNING OBJECTIVES: This class will focus on the comedic mode of film acting, extending from television and sketch comedy to cinema. Scene study from the history of comedy performance and in-class scene work will lead to a final original comedy project.

EVALUATION METHOD: Class participation, in-class scene work, out-of-class film projects
name: Topics in Acting for the Screen
subject: RTVF
